node.title: How to drop all collections in a MongoDB database using Mongoose
What is the difference between an Argument and a Paramter
node.summary: Argument and parameter are often used interchangeably, find out the difference.

node.title: REST - Representational State Transfer
node.summary: Usually, when people speak about REST APIs they mean a web API that uses the HTTP request methods (POST, GET, PUT, DELETE, etc.) to modify or access the state of a resource.
